brainly_data.question: The weather patterns seen on earth are influenced greatly by a. Constant motion of the tech tonic plates b. Strength and direction of earths magnetic field c. Amount of oxygen in the troposphere d. Cycling of water in and out of the atmosphere
brainly_data.subject: Biology

all_answers.question: The weather patterns seen on earth are influenced greatly by a. Constant motion of the tech tonic plates b. Strength and direction of earths magnetic field c. Amount of oxygen in the troposphere d. Cycling of water in and out of the atmosphere
all_answers.subject: Biology
all_answers.text: D. Cycling of water in and out of the atmosphere because weather patterns are all caused by water and the water cycle.

all_answers.question: The weather patterns seen on earth are influenced greatly by a. Constant motion of the tech tonic plates b. Strength and direction of earths magnetic field c. Amount of oxygen in the troposphere d. Cycling of water in and out of the atmosphere
all_answers.subject: Biology
all_answers.text: The correct answer is B because The weather patterns seen on earth are influenced greatly by strength and direction>

top_answer.question: The weather patterns seen on earth are influenced greatly by a. Constant motion of the tech tonic plates b. Strength and direction of earths magnetic field c. Amount of oxygen in the troposphere d. Cycling of water in and out of the atmosphere
top_answer.subject: Biology
top_answer.text: D. Cycling of water in and out of the atmosphere because weather patterns are all caused by water and the water cycle.
